item.title: Container Infrastructure Management Solution
item.description: OpenStack Magnum is a powerful Container Infrastructure Management service that simplifies the deployment and management of container orchestration engines like Kubernetes, Docker Swarm, and Mesos on OpenStack clouds. It allows users to easily create and manage container clusters using OpenStack resources such as Nova, Neutron, and Cinder. By integrating container management directly into OpenStack, Magnum enables a unified platform for both virtual machine and container workloads, improving flexibility and scalability for cloud-native applications.
